vclaim: If a customer says "my pleasure" to a Chick-fil-A employee, they are entitled to a discount, a free ice cream menu item, or free food altogether.
title: Does Saying ‘My Pleasure’ at Chick-fil-A Earn Free Food?
subtitle: TikTok videos and tweets have claimed for years that saying "my pleasure" at Chick-fil-A earned customers a discount, free ice cream, or free food.
author: Jordan Liles
